message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $11,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand its value to you, but I'm looking for something closer to $11,300.  Would that be agreeable?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $11,200 for the product.
